module.name: Music on Hold
module.description: Uploading and management of sound files (wav, mp3) to be used for on-hold music.
module.changelog: *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10328 and other tweaks *13.0.5* FREEPBX-6329, FREEPBX-5631, FREEPBX-6162, FREEPBX-4762, FREEPBX-1497, FREEPBX-7544, FREEPBX-6989 In browser playback *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9688 Fixes numerous issues *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9754 fixes visual issues *13.0.2* Version bump Beta *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Styling Changes *12.0.1* BMO Object *2.11.0.2* Include license file *2.11.0.1* Use rate instead of resample for sox resampling #6347 *2.10.0.2* #5337, #4919 *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* new version changes *2.9.0.1* #4740 *2.9.0.0* 2.9 Update
